nodes.text: Jybbuk-fruit was a type of sweet-tasting fruit. In 4 ABY, the former Imperial loyalty officer Sinjir Rath Velus consumed the alcoholic beverage sashin-leaf mead while visiting the cantina Pok's Place in the Outer Rim planet Akiva's capital city of Myrra. He felt the mead tasted like a mixture of jybbuk-fruit and oi-oi berries.
Jybbuk-fruit was first mentioned in Aftermath, a 2015 novel written by Chuck Wendig.
